Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-57807 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.76.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-57807 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.76.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.76.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-57807
